The avg cost of child care in MA is over $20K/yr – more than in-state tuition at UMass. When families can’t afford high-quality care, their kids are at a disadvantage before they even reach kindergarten. That’s why I've got a bill for #UniversalChildCare. https://www.wwlp.com/news/massachusetts/study-massachusetts-is-second-in-state-for-most-expensive-infant-care/

Real superheroes are ordinary people doing extraordinary things. George Allen, a home care worker in NV, is the very definition of this but we aren't doing right by him. He deserves a living wage and it's why I'm fighting for home care workers like George. https://thenevadaindependent.com/article/i-need-a-superman-for-me-homeless-home-care-worker-advocates-for-better-working-conditions-a-living-wage

Every letter I read gives me yet another reason to keep dreaming big and fighting hard for the big, structural change that Americans everywhere want to see. I’m grateful down to my bones for your support. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAfPIclWkAA90ld.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1155116450778140673/vid/320x568/wxtnQS1F6tI_waGy.mp4?tag=13

The Trump administration’s decision to resume the death penalty is both misguided and immoral. I've long opposed the death penalty because it is discriminatory, irreversible, ineffective, and a gross misuse of taxpayer dollars.

The administration must reverse course immediately.

I am proud our campaign headquarters is in Rep. Elijah Cummings' district. Baltimore has become home to my team and it's disgraceful the president has chosen to start his morning disparaging this great American city.

I relish the idea of defeating Donald Trump, the most dangerous president in history. But more importantly, I look forward to working with millions of you to create a government based on love and compassion, not hate and greed. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1154887623883853825/img/V2GtVDhsaz-QCrmn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1154887623883853825/vid/320x320/rwcXrRbOfaQP0kdh.mp4?tag=13

We must undo the damage Trump has done to the rights of home care workers. We will enact a domestic workers bill of rights and guarantee these workers a living wage, workplace safety protections, fair scheduling, and protect their right to organize. https://www.teenvogue.com/story/home-care-workers-under-attack-by-the-trump-administration

Today, our distinguished delegation met with top officials at the @USArmyAfrica HQ. .@RepCummings is a champion in the Congress and the country for civil rights and economic justice, a beloved leader in Baltimore, and deeply valued colleague. We all reject racist attacks against him and support his steadfast leadership. #ElijahCummingsIsAPatriot https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1155073964634517505 QT @realDonaldTrump Rep, Elijah Cummings has been a brutal bully, shouting and screaming at the great men & women of Border Patrol about conditions at the Southern Border, when actually his Baltimore district is FAR WORSE and more dangerous. His district is considered the Worst in the USA......

By the end of the mtg, I had no idea if I made the cut.

If you look at Oversight, it includes many all-stars of Congress.

From @RepRaskin to @RoKhanna, Cummings is a legendary coach who brings the best out of everyone.

He makes the country better. You want to be on his team.

He looked right at me & said: “I am going to ask you plainly: Are you here to do the work?”

People’s lives are at stake in urgent ways on Oversight. He demanded excellence, & was watching my every word.

I said “Yes” &made my best case incl why & how I wanted to be on the cmte.

Let me tell you a story about Chairman @RepCummings.

Before new members are assigned to Congressional committees, we have to make our case to the chair.

Chairman Cummings was TOUGH. I sat down in his office to make my case for Oversight, and I was quite nervous. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1152027532977496064 QT @thehill "None of us would have our children in that position! They are human beings!”

This is painful.

This is a moral, defining moment in America. 

Other generations had to answer: 

When the Know Nothings, McCarthy, Wallace and so many others sought to demean, degrade, demagogue and divide, 

What did you do?

We must now answer. 

Silence is toxic complicity. https://twitter.com/joshscampbell/status/1155121131059179520 QT @joshscampbell “Donald Trump has tweeted more than 43,000 times. He’s insulted thousands of people… but when he tweets about infestation, it’s about black and brown people.” http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAfQigHUwAAmKiW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1155120863018020868/vid/480x270/yiBNeTcYyLTv2e_7.mp4?tag=13

Teaching law at @UHouston was a dream come true, but incredibly hard while raising two little kids. Lack of high-quality, affordable child care almost sunk me—until Aunt Bee came to help. The fight for #UniversalChildCare is personal for me. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1155157468575621120/img/BP8UnXQfcLSDJWLa.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1155157468575621120/vid/480x270/z0yV0r0V-whs7tHn.mp4?tag=13

The inventors of insulin sold the patent for just $1 so it would be available to all.

97 years later, Americans are dying because drugmakers like Eli Lilly charge $300 for a vial of insulin. Tomorrow I will be joining diabetics to buy insulin in Canada for one-tenth the price. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAf2qsOW4AAd69Q.jpg

Don’t let this go unnoticed: earlier this week the Trump administration proposed cutting nutritional assistance for roughly 3 million low-income people.
 
This, coming from the same administration that gifted corporations and the top 1% billions in tax cuts, is absurd. https://twitter.com/npr/status/1153742340898611200 QT @NPR The Trump administration wants to change the way states determine who qualifies for SNAP benefits. An estimated 3 million people would lose their food assistance as a result.
https://trib.al/HUlfpUF

Public support for Medicare for All is rising. Why? The reason is pretty obvious. It is getting harder and harder to defend a dysfunctional health care system in which 30,000 people die every year because they don't get to a doctor when they should. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAgXxfpWwAAthOn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1155192331894763520/vid/320x320/W60haVMKd0-vrWq4.mp4?tag=13

RT @IAinsulin4all Another caravan to Canada to get cheaper insulin! Regardless of what you think of his politics, this is a HUGE deal that a top-tier Presidential candidate is highlighting this crisis in America. 
#insulin4all
#MNinsulin4all

Nearly 1 in 4 Black Americans who earn bachelor's degrees in science and engineering graduate from HBCUs—yet HBCUs remain under-resourced across our country. Let’s ensure HBCUs have the resources to invest in STEM education and research.

Under its proposed policy, 3 million Americans in need could lose the ability to put food on the table. This is outrageous. https://www.npr.org/2019/07/23/744451246/3-million-could-lose-food-stamp-benefits-under-trump-administration-proposal

Right now, there are college students across our country worried they’ll go hungry. Some will sleep in their car tonight because they can’t afford housing. This shouldn’t happen in America. I introduced a bill to help college students afford basic needs.

To get serious about climate change and reduce our reliance on fossil fuels, we need to end Big Oil’s stranglehold on Washington. As president, I’ll eliminate fossil fuel subsidies and put a moratorium on new fossil fuel leases offshore or on public lands. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/25/opinion/climate-change-fossil-fuels.html

The fossil fuel companies lied to us about climate change for decades, and they are not going to help us solve our climate crisis now. We are going to save this planet by taking them on and building an unprecedented movement for a Green New Deal.

After decades of economic decline and increased poverty, the government of Puerto Rico must finally respond to the needs of struggling working families, and not the greed of vulture capitalists from Wall Street who have exacerbated the financial crisis on the island. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAhcdpNXUAYXDNC.jpg

Using the gay and trans ‘panic’ defense in court provides an out for those who commit violence against LGBTQ+ people and denies justice to victims. I was proud to be part of the effort to outlaw it in California. Now, we have a bill to ban it nationwide—Congress must pass it.

Woo-hoo, thanks for coming out today, New Hampshire! I'm grateful down to my toes that we got to talk about the big, structural change we're fighting for. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAhmrNsXUAAJMpU.jpg

Unions brought us to the eight-hour workday, the five-day workweek, sick leave, and vacation time.

Workers should never be made to fight for their case alone. They should be able to organize and stand together. #UnionStrong

Yesterday I announced that, as president, I’ll establish a student loan debt forgiveness program for Pell Grant recipients who start a business that operates for three years in disadvantaged communities.
